com.compendium.core.db
Class DBLinkedFile

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.core.db.DBLinkedFile

public class DBLinkedFile
extends java.lang.Object

The DBLinkedFiles class is the interface which is used to access the LinkedFiles table in the database

Author:
Sebastian Ehrich

insert

public static LinkedFile insert(DBConnection dbcon,
                                java.lang.String fileID,
                                java.io.File file)
                         throws java.io.IOException
Inserts the given file into the linked file table of the database

Parameters:
dbcon - the database connection
fileID - a unique id of the file
file - the file to insert into the database
Returns:
a LinkedFile object for the inserted file
Throws:
java.io.IOException - Occurs if there are errors while reading the input file.

Copy the contents of a database object to a file.

Parameters:
dbcon - the database connection to use
lFile - the object representing the database object
file - the file or directory to copy the database object to
Returns:
the file the database object was copied to or null if copying failed

java.io.IOException

del

                          LinkedFile linkedFile)
                   throws java.sql.SQLException
Delete the given linkedFile from the database

Parameters:
dbcon - the database connection
linkedFile - the LinkedFile object which should be deleted
Returns:
Trueif and only if the linked file is deleted, false otherwise.

referenceCount

public static int referenceCount(DBConnection dbcon,
                                 java.net.URI linkedFileUri)
                          throws java.sql.SQLException
Check for a given linked file, whether there are references to this file.

Parameters:
dbcon - the database connection to use
linkedFileUri - the complete uri of the linked file which to check for existing references
Returns:
Trueif and only if there are referenced to the linked file, false otherwise.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
